title: Watch: Elephants In Karnataka Played Football & It's The Most Adorable Thing You'll See!
text:
Watch: Elephants In Karnataka Played Football & It's The Most Adorable Thing You'll See!

Watch: Elephants In Karnataka Played Football & It's The Most Adorable Thing You'll See!

Elephants are one of the largest animals on earth and one of the cutest too! As a proof, take a look at this group of elephants playing football in an open football field, while lots of tourists stand there to see them enjoying the game.

The video of the incident is going viral on social media, where the group of elephants can be spotted playing football in an open field. They are seen kicking the football to one another as trainers sit on the top of the jumbos directing them.

Watch the video here:

#WATCH Karnataka: Elephants who took part in the parade during #Dasara festival in Mysuru, were seen playing football yesterday, after they were shifted to Dubare Elephant Camp* in Kodagu district. pic.twitter.com/yHonc8q3Sz — ANI (@ANI) October 22, 2019

The elephants had taken part in the parade during Mysore Dasara (Dussehra) festival and they were recently shifted to Dubare Elephant Camp in Kodagu district. The animals were trained at the camp. Dubare camp is a project undertaken by the Forest Department and Jungle Lodges and Resorts Ltd.

People on social media seem to have loved the video, it garnered over 17,000 views, 510 likes and a lot of comments showering love on the elephants.
